issue.title: [CF 841] Sorting by duration does not ignore GCD
issue.body:
This is on version 6.2.1

In short: Sorting by duration takes GCD into consideration. I do not believe that one usually would want that.

In long:

Let Icon 1 be a spell cooldown, Icon 2 a buff.

Sorting is set to 'duration from low to high' and 'Icon ID from low to high' in this order.

Let the buff not be present, the spell not be on cooldown.

Since durations are equal, sorting will be 'Icon 1, Icon 2'.

While on GCD, sorting will be 'Icon 2, Icon 1' for the duration of the GCD.

This is independent of the 'allow GCD' option in the timer section.


> Posted by CurseForge user tfmm | Imported from CurseForge issue #841 | Raw
